title: Anti-corruption layer
summary: Isolate legacy models and behaviors so they do not leak into modern services.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Legacy middleware often encodes legacy semantics; copying them forward locks in complexity.
whenToUse: Legacy systems have awkward schemas or behaviors
whenNotToUse: You can replace the legacy system in a short time with low risk

gotchas: ACL becomes a permanent dumping ground
Too much transformation hides business meaning
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Keep ACL thin: translate terms, not business decisions.

complexity.rationale: Introduces an extra layer but reduces long-term coupling.

realWorldExample.approach: Wrapped legacy endpoints with contract translators and gradual cutover.
realWorldExample.outcome: Reduced churn in modern domains while retiring legacy.
